A4.text: France and Australia met at the Millennium Stadium on 6 November 1999.

A5.text: France and Australia met at the Millennium Stadium on 6 November 1999, with Australia winning 35â€“12 to become the first team to win the Webb Ellis Cup twice.

A6.text: The 1999 tournament was hosted by Wales with matches also being held throughout the rest of the United Kingdom, Ireland and France.
